b_ExpenseReimbursement.报销明细（非增值税专用发票，税率处请填写0）: Business Expenses Details(Non-VAT Invoice, Please input 0 to tax rate field)

ERCommon.申请人的基础信息不完整，无法提交申请,请联系系统管理员！: You can not submit this form because the applicant's basic information is incomplete,Please contact the administrator!
ERCommon.填写借款明细时，必须填写完整！: Your cash advance details are incomplete!
ERCommon.当非项目时，明细不可填写项目名称！: When you choose non project type, project name must be null!
ERCommon.当为项目时，明细请填写项目名称！: When you choose project type, please input project name!
ERCommon.税率中设置范围[0,1)，超出范围不让填写。（可以为0）: The tax rate field can only enter Numbers greater than or equal to 0, less than 1
ERCommon.预算内且报销金额<=5,000元：申请人->高级经理->总监: In policy claims and total expense<=5,000RMB: Applicant->Senior Manager->Director
ERCommon.预算内且5,000元<报销金额<=10,000元: 申请人->高级经理->总监-: In policy claims and 5,000RMB<total expense<=10,000RMB: Applicant->Senior Manager->Director->VP
ERCommon.预算外或报销金额>10,000元： 申请人->高级经理->总监->VP->GM: Out of policy claims or total expense>10,000RMB: Applicant->Senior Manager->Director->VP->GM
ERCommon.预算内且报销金额<=5,000元：申请人->项目高级经理->项目总监: In policy claims and total expense<=5,000RMB: Applicant->Project Senior Manager->Project Director
ERCommon.预算内且5,000元<报销金额<=10,000元: 申请人->项目高级经理->项: In policy claims and 5,000RMB<total expense<=10,000RMB: Applicant->Project Senior Manager->Project Director->Project VP
ERCommon.预算外或报销金额>10,000元： 申请人->高级经理->项目总监->项目VP-: Out of policy claims or total expense>10,000RMB: Applicant->Project Senior Manager->Project Director->Project VP->GM
ERCommon.根据DOA审批后审批流程为财务分析员->费用会计审核->财务总监审核->费用会计: According to DOA approved workflow: Financial Analsyt->Expense Accountant Check->Financial Director->Expense Accountant Creation->End
ERCommon.输入的时间格式有误: The input time format is incorrect!
ERCommon.部门经理和部门总监必填一项！: The department manager and director at least one cannot be empty!
ERCommon.部门经理和部门总监不可为同一人: The department manager and dempartment director should not input the same person.
